remark.ch: 本門課每隔三週上課3小時,第一周會上課

goal.en: "The course covers the fundamentals and applications of FinTech (financial technology). The goal is to facilitate the students with the basic understanding of FinTech (financial technology). In addition, with the arrangement of industry companies’ site visits or industry leaders’ guest speaking, it will enhance the students understanding on Taiwan Market’s development."

textbook.en: "1. ‘銀行轉型未來式 Bank 3.0: Why Banking Is No Longer Somewhere You Go But Something You Do,’ Brett King 出版社：財團法人台灣金融研訓院出版日期：2015/07/14 2. ‘Breaking Banks: The Innovators, Rogues, and Strategists Rebooting Banking,’ Brett King 原文出版社：John Wiley & Sons Inc 出版日期：2014/05/05 3. 數位銀行：銀行數位轉型策略指南‘Digital Bank: Strategies to Launch or Become a Digital Bank,’ Chris Skinner 中文翻譯： 孫一仕 ， 財團法人台灣金融研訓院 ，出版日期：2014-10-23 4. ‘The End of Banking: Money, Credit, and the Digital Revolution,’ Jonathan McMillan，Publisher： Zero/One Economics GmbH 5. ‘Bye Bye Banks?: How Retail Banks are Being Displaced, Diminished and Disintermediated by Tech Startups and What They Can Do to Survive,’ James Haycock, Shane Richmond, Publisher: Wunderkammer"
textbook.ch: "1. ‘銀行轉型未來式 Bank 3.0: Why Banking Is No Longer Somewhere You Go But Something You Do,’ Brett King 出版社：財團法人台灣金融研訓院出版日期：2015/07/14 2. ‘Breaking Banks: The Innovators, Rogues, and Strategists Rebooting Banking,’ Brett King 原文出版社：John Wiley & Sons Inc 出版日期：2014/05/05 3. 數位銀行：銀行數位轉型策略指南‘Digital Bank: Strategies to Launch or Become a Digital Bank,’ Chris Skinner 中文翻譯： 孫一仕 ， 財團法人台灣金融研訓院 ，出版日期：2014-10-23 4. ‘The End of Banking: Money, Credit, and the Digital Revolution,’ Jonathan McMillan，Publisher： Zero/One Economics GmbH 5. ‘Bye Bye Banks?: How Retail Banks are Being Displaced, Diminished and Disintermediated by Tech Startups and What They Can Do to Survive,’ James Haycock, Shane Richmond, Publisher: Wunderkammer"
